references.reason: This paper introduced the Transformer architecture, a groundbreaking model that revolutionized natural language processing and has had a significant influence across many other fields of AI.

references.paper_title: Representation learning: A review and new perspectives
references.reason: This paper provides a comprehensive overview of representation learning, a fundamental concept in deep learning that underpins many successful AI models.

references.paper_title: Hierarchical text-conditional image generation with CLIP latents
references.reason: This work introduced a significant advancement in text-to-image generation, demonstrating a method for generating high-quality images based on textual descriptions.
This paper offers a valuable overview of the rapidly evolving field of LLM-powered autonomous agents, which are the core focus of this study.

references.paper_title: OSWorld: Benchmarking multimodal agents for open-ended tasks in real computer environments
references.reason: This paper introduced a benchmark that is highly relevant to this study, as it provides a way to evaluate the performance of digital agents on real-world tasks.
